description:
The University of East London’s Architecture and Visual Arts is a lively School that combines, Architecture, Physical Design and the Visual Arts. This perfect combination of creative programmes cross-pollinate, providing a fertile ground for creation, arts and design.
Our presence  will feature guided tours to the state-of-the-art facilities, creative studios, and ‘Way out East’ gallery.

events.name: Drop in: UEL Docklands guided tour
events.notes: Tour the Architecture school facilities, studios and labs. See the student work exhibited and the digital manufactured pavilion erected.

events.name: Drop in: UEL Docklands guided tour
events.notes: Tour the Architecture school facilities, studios and labs. See the student work exhibited and the digital manufactured pavilion erected.

factsheet.heading: Architecture and Physical Design School
paragraphs:
UEL Architecture and Physical Design School benefits from outstanding facilities in our Dockland Campus facing the river. Our teaching and design briefs show the interest of our staff and students in addressing the climate emergency. This is materialized by the students’ choice of building technologies, approach to the site, environmental comfort, and reduced use of energy. It reflects our concern for tackling the climate emergency and providing a healthier, eco-friendly and sustainable environment.
You will see the architecture school and several student work and research projects.

name: University of East London - Architecture and Visual Art
